    • Would you like to tell us about a lower price?

Product description

The Strike Pack F.P.S. Dominator is a breakthrough Controller adapter that adds advanced gaming functionality to your existing Xbox One Controller. The adapter gives you on the fly button mapping and the latest shooter mods without any permanent modification or voiding of your warranty. Simply snap it into your Controller, plug in the 10ft cable, and get ready to experience lightning reaction times and unlimited control. Built in Controller mods use a revolutionary new control system allowing full control right from the Controller itself. Just unprecedented gaming control. Hundreds of Mod combinations are possible; rapid Fire, Turbo 2.0 & much more! download the Mod Central App from Strike Pack.Com for more customization.

From the manufacturer

On the Fly Remappable Paddles

Without the use of Apps or connecting to a PC, the standout feature of the Strike Pack is the on the fly paddle remapping. This feature allows you to assign any button on your controller to either one of the two paddles. Mapping on the fly frees your thumbs and allows you to keep them on the sticks, increasing your response times and giving you a definitive advantage over other players to dominate your gaming sessions.

Read more

Ergonomic Design and Responsive Switches

The Strike Pack is precision crafted to fit the official standard Xbox One controllers (Elite controllers not supported) in an ergonomic fashion, giving access to the optimal placement of paddles and a comfortable feel. We focused our efforts on making high quality responsive switches to ensure lightning quick response times while maintaining a comfortable and intuitive experience.

Read more

Included Mods

The Strike Pack comes pre-installed with many useful and unique MODS to level the playing field and take your gaming to the next level.

Some of the included MODS:

Anti-Recoil Adjustable, Quick Scope, Auto Run, Drop Shot, Rapid Fire, Optimized Rapid Fire, Rapid Fire Adjustable, Pulse Fire Adjustable, Burst Fire Adjustable, MW Jitter, Anti-Recoil, Auto Hold Breath, Turbo Melee, Double Jump, Auto Spot, ADS and Hair Triggers.

Read more

Paddle Activated Mods

Map MODS to either one, or both of your Strike Packs paddles for quick activation during gameplay. Think of this as a shortcut to performing complex in-game functions, one touch of a paddle and you are given enhanced abilities to eliminate enemies and take control within your games.

Read more

How does Amazon calculate star ratings?
Amazon calculates a products star ratings using a machine learned model instead of a raw data average. The machine learned model takes into account factors including: the age of a review, helpfulness votes by customers and whether the reviews are from verified purchases.

Top Reviews

There was a problem filtering reviews right now. Please try again later.

Jaycuse
4.0 out of 5 stars Got it for Rocket Leage on PC
Reviewed in Canada on January 16, 2019
Verified Purchase
It seems like controllers with paddles in Canada don't come cheap. The Evil shift, Scuff and Xbox Elite all end up costing way too much for the added paddles. The steam controller is probably your cheapest bet but it has plenty of other flaws. This mod is a great way to get paddles on the cheap. The only downside is that it's 2 paddles. Not the biggest deal for me since my usecase really only requires 1.

The paddles work great for me. I haven't really tried other paddle controllers because I don't have 2k to spend on controllers. The only other one I can compare to is the Steam controller. The steam controller it's more of a squeeze action to trigger the paddle. These ones here it's more of a push up motion with your ring finger. It didn't take too long for me to adjust. They have a satisfying click and overall I'm happy with the build quality.

The modpack stuff that they advertise is designed for console and they don't support PC but if you're just looking for some paddles that you can bind to whatever key you want this will do the trick.

I've only tested it with Rocket League on steam.

I did update the firmware before trying it out. I recommend updating the firmware. They have updates that fix some binding issues that they use to have in "Tournament mode". Tournament mode is what you would be using it on PC. I haven't tested other modes.
Read more
7 people found this helpful
Helpful
 Comment Report abuse
Brad
2.0 out of 5 stars Include a battery and I might change the rating...
Reviewed in Canada on June 10, 2019
Verified Purchase
If you have a wireless controller, it means you don't want to be wired into your Xbox or Computer, so this product forces you to be wired in or it wont work, simple as that, which me needing a wireless controller, was basically a waste of money, also, button mapping on the fly? press the left paddle and it uses the left button on the d-pad's control, same with right, and there is no instructions or software to download to map those buttons to something different. On top of not having a battery so it forces you to be wired, it has a micro usb cable on the top that has to bend and puts a lot of force on the micro usb port on the controller, which I can see breaking that port quite easily, then you have to plug a micro usb into the back of the thing in order to get it powered, and because of that, good luck setting the controller down when its plugged in.

Needed improvements: Battery of at least 1000mah charge that can charge through the standard micro usb port on the controller itself so it doesn't force people to be wired in at all times, software that allows you to map the 2 paddles to other controls that are not on the controller which is the whole point in adding buttons, the paddles are plastic and feel cheap and the actual button press on those paddles is very underwhelming.

the only reason it gets 2 stars is because it works at least, so I can map my left and right d-pad buttons to whatever I want those paddles to do without reaching for the d-pad, but other then that, it really isn't worth it. However, if those changes are made, which I would imagine the price the would go up, it will make this totally worth it. As it is now, I am not using it, because I am not going to risk ruining my new Xbox 1 controller's micro usb port, and would rather keep my battery pack in my controller so I can keep it wireless and only go wired when it needs charging.
Read more

4.0 out of 5 stars Works as intended
Reviewed in Canada on April 10, 2019
Verified Purchase
I bought these for Xbox one and I got a lot more then I expected with all its extra functions, I initially wanted it for the paddles but found the paddle to be too far in to be really comfortable its more of a press up then a squeeze motion like on another controller I had that had similar type buttons on the back/handle, I read you can change the paddles though so I would look into if they have a more pronounced option if I was to buy this again, the whole mod part works from what I have tried and is arguably easier to setup via the app then their other products, the on the fly options are a whole different story, great and fast to switch once you memorize them but confusing as hell till you do.

Thats for the remapping, if you want to actually mod it, you have to purchase the Mod|Pass on the mod central website, which is an additional 15 Us Dollars or 11.50 pounds sterling.

Is it cheating? Yes. Is it fair to use on CoD? Yes. Heres why.
- unfair because you have a unfair advantage.
- fair to use in CoD because after youve learnt to use it, youll soon see just how many are using it.

Its fun to play with in zombies. I do not condone using this. I got a 10 point KD in CoD. All Legit. Solo playing so it is possible to do good without cheating, but do I think of it as cheating in Modern warfar 2019? No. Youll see why afterwards. Trust me.

Lee Jones
5.0 out of 5 stars Brilliant purchase!
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 15, 2019
Verified Purchase
Excellent piece of kit. I've always wanted a Scuf but could never quite justify paying so much for a controller. This mod pack has given me the paddles I've always wanted. They take a bit of getting used too, I've had them 1 week and I'm still trying to find my ideal paddle mapping combination but they work superbly. There's no delay after button press and feel really comfortable. The only drawback is that it connects via a micro usb cable so your controller is effectively wired but that's definitely not a deal breaker. If you're buying this for the 'mods', i.e quick fire, etc.. you have to pay a yearly subscription. I haven't done that because I'm not a cheating s.o.b but each to their own ;-) I'd highly recommend these to anyone who can't afford a Scuf/elite, or don't wanna pay extortionate amounts of money.

Evan
4.0 out of 5 stars Adding paddles is a fantastic enhancement
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 30, 2019
Verified Purchase
Great alternative to the Elite Controller for adding paddles, though after having my first one for about a year one of the paddles snapped. It was easy to replace with replacement sets sold on amazon. The cable holds incredibly well in its socket, I cant believe the life Ive gotten out of that micro USB socket. The only drawback to the bracing USB socket design is that if the cable fails, you need to buy one specifically for this, but replacements of that are available as well. I havent used any of the mod pack features aka cheating for online games and shooters, but the paddles are fantastic for being able to keep your fingers on your joysticks while jumping/reloading, and for manual paddle shifting in racing games. Being able to shift with these paddles feels almost exactly like paddle shifting in a car due to how you hold the controller and squeeze the paddles, definitely a nice enhancement. I do wish it would work wirelessly, but I honestly dont really mind playing wired anymore, its actually been kind of nice to not have to worry about charging anymore. Also, by adding on an Elite Controller D-Pad/Stick replacement kit (also from Amazon) as well as using some grips which add a trigger stop (made useful by the fact the Mod Pack allows you to turn the analog triggers to digital - so after a short pull they activate fully) Ive essentially made my controller into an Elite - minus two of the paddles on the Elite at least. All of the other features except software tweaks in the Xbox Accessories app are fully there. Its to the point where using a controller which doesnt have The Mod Kits paddles feels strange and uncomfortable. Id definitely recommend the mod pack, but please, if youre playing online, dont use any of the recoil reducing or other controller-hack features, its super lame and I wish theyd sell a paddle pack without the mod features.
Read more

Verified Purchase

The only problem I have as a 24 y/o is my hands just feel too big to comfortably sit on the rear pedal and I can feel my hands cramping just because theyre sat differently to the way theyve sat for years.

If your looking to buy an elite controller/scuff because you feel like it may up your game, grab this first and test the way it sits in your hands.

This product is a straight 5/5any worries I had when reading the reviews were quickly forgotten when setting up and using.

2 minutes to set it up.
Well built.
The controller MUST be when using this. The cable provided was decentall this is coming from a snob!
